premise_source_doc_sentence: He is noted for his roles in five feature-length films : Lo Wei 's The Big Boss  (  1971  )  and Fist of Fury  (  1972  )  ; Golden Harvest 's Way of the Dragon  (  1972  )  , directed and written by Lee ; Golden Harvest and Warner Brothers ' Enter the Dragon  (  1973  )  and The Game of Death  (  1978  )  , both directed by Robert Clouse .
